name: Radish Pie
description:
## Radish Pie

Despised by humans, loved by Goblins! Owning this item unlocks crop seeds.

You can craft this item at the Kitchen in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

SFL
60 Radish

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/crop-farming#kitchen-recipes)
